me.Salt.Util.Utility.Games.CardsAgainstDiscord.util

Class CaDGameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      • me.Salt.Util.Utility.Games.CardsAgainstDiscord.util.CaDGameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.EventListener

    public class CaDGameManager
extends net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.ListenerAdapter
    This class is designed to handle and manage the control flow of every registered instance of CaDGameHandler.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CaDGameManager.PlayState
      The PlayState represents the current state of activity that a Cards Against Discord game session is at.

    • Field Summary

      A Set of Map entries that associate CaDGameManager.PlayStates with HandlerContainer instances.

      A HashMap containing game owner ID's, and their respective CaDGameHandler game instance

    • Method Detail

      • getEmbeds

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ResponseContainer> getEmbeds()

      • addToEmbeds

        public static void addToEmbeds(java.lang.String messageId,
                               ResponseContainer.ResponseExpector responseExpected,
                               CaDGameHandler caDGameHandler)
        When issuing a game-related message, it is likely it will require a response from the user. To do this, the ID of the message is recorded and, upon the modification of a message reaction, the ID of the message is checked. This method allows for a message to be registered as requiring action, by specifying the ID of the message, the ResponseContainer.ResponseExpector, and the CaDGameHandler instance it is associated with.
        Parameters:
        messageId - String - The ID of the message
        responseExpected - ResponseContainer.ResponseExpector - The response we expect to gain from the message
        caDGameHandler - CaDGameHandler - The Cards Against Discord game instance that this message is linked to

      • registerHandler

        public static void registerHandler(CaDGameHandler handler)
        This method is used to register a CaDGameHandler instance to this class.
        Parameters:
        handler - CaDGameHandler - The game instance to be registered

      • modifyHandler

        public static void modifyHandler(java.lang.String ownerId,
                                 CaDGameManager.PlayState playState)
        This method allows for a CaDGameHandler instance to have its CaDGameManager.PlayState updated, by specifying the ID of the CaDGameHandler.owner.
        Parameters:
        ownerId - String - The ID of the game's owner
        playState - CaDGameManager.PlayState - The new PlayState to update the game with

      • invoke

        private static void invoke()
        This method is called when registering and updating game handlers. It calls upon the HandlerContainer.shouldInvoke() method to determine if the current handler should be interacted with and - if true - switches through its contained CaDGameManager.PlayState. The corresponding methods are then called upon, to handle the game's state changes.

      • unregisterHandler

        public static void unregisterHandler(CaDGameHandler handler)

      • invokeStart

        private static void invokeStart(CaDGameHandler toHandle)
        This method invokes and handles the startup phase of a game, including:
        • Assigning White cards to each player
        • Informing each player of their white cards
        • Selecting the (next) Card Czar
        • Informing the Card Czar that they have been selected
        • Managing time delays between card distribution and card selection stages
        Parameters:
        toHandle - CaDGameHandler - The current game instance that is being invoked

      • invokeIdle

        private static void invokeIdle(CaDGameHandler toHandle)
        This method handles the steps taken for an idle Cards Against Discord game.
        Parameters:
        toHandle - CaDGameHandler - The current game instance that is being invoked

      • invokeCardSubmitting

        private static void invokeCardSubmitting(CaDGameHandler toHandle)
        This method handles the steps taken for a Cards Against Discord game in the 'card submission' phase.
        Parameters:
        toHandle - CaDGameHandler - The current game instance that is being invoked
